original_title: Camel: Ichigo Ichie - Live in Japan 2016
overview: Two hours of live Camel from the tour no one thought would ever happen!  Ichigo Ichie:'Treasure every encounter for it will never recur'  Recorded in Tokyo at the EX Theatre in Roppongi during May 2016 featuring:  Andrew Latimer (guitars, vocals, flute, recorder)  Colin Bass (bass, vocals)  Denis Clement (drums, recorder)  Pete Jones (keyboards, vocals, penny whistle)
tagline: Ichigo Ichie - Treasure every encounter for it will never recur
title: Camel: Ichigo Ichie - Live in Japan 2016
